name: Space War (itch) (Ddollz)
description:
A simple game made during the GMTK Game Jam
Im not really proud of the game I'm sick when i was making this

Instruction:
Space - Continue/Slow motion
The ship will follow the cursor
Enemies:
Your own bullet
When Bullet is White Nothing will until it gets hit by the wall and it will change to
color red it can kill you, When Bullet is Green can kill the red bullet only when white bullet hits red bullet
